partintro.para: query-ria plugin is composed of Query Ria Service that provides a common API necessary to reflect the data format subordinate to UI in DB without separate conversion process when UI is developed using Ria Platform such as MiPlatform, XPlatform and Gauce and data access layers are developed using Query Service, and reference libraries necessary to execute Query Ria Service.
Install query-ria-plugin by entering the following command in the Command window.
The installation result can be checked using the installed (mvn anyframe:installed) or the jetty:run (mvn clean jetty:run) commands.
